clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Madalena Association in the Treatment of Type II Diabetes Mellitus
clinical_study.official_title: National, Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind, Triple-dummy, Phase III Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Madalena Association in the Treatment of Type II Diabetes Mellitus.

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of Madalena association in the treatment of type 2 diabetes mellitus.

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in glycated hemoglobin (HbA1c) levels.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence and severity of adverse events recorded during the study.

intervention.description: Empagliflozin 10 mg + linagliptin 5 mg coated tablet.
